plot: An Iraqi mother seeks health care for her 10-year-old son, who is dying of AIDS, against a background of war and occupation.
title: Sari's Mother
plot_es: An Iraqi mother seeks health care for her 10-year-old son, who is dying of AIDS, against a background of war and occupation.
plot_en: An Iraqi mother seeks health care for her 10-year-old son, who is dying of AIDS, against a background of war and occupation.
